titleStmt.title: A brief disquisition of the law of nature according to the principles and method laid down in the Reverend Dr. Cumberland's (now Lord Bishop of Peterboroughs) Latin treatise on that subject : as also his confutations of Mr. Hobb's principles put into another method : with the Right Reverend author's approbation.
titleStmt.author: Tyrrell, James, 1642-1718.

titleStmt.title: A brief disquisition of the law of nature according to the principles and method laid down in the Reverend Dr. Cumberland's (now Lord Bishop of Peterboroughs) Latin treatise on that subject : as also his confutations of Mr. Hobb's principles put into another method : with the Right Reverend author's approbation.
titleStmt.author: Tyrrell, James, 1642-1718.
Cumberland, Richard, 1631-1718. De legibus naturae disquisitio philosophica.
